mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE,BOARD_SEQ FROM CATEGORY WHERE SEQ=#{seq}

SELECT p.SEQ, m.ID,p.TITLE,p.CONTENT,p.REGDATE,p.REF,p.STEP,p.DEPTH,p.READCOUNT,p.DELFLAG,p.REGDATE,p.NOTICE,p.MEMBER_SEQ,p.BOARD_SEQ,p.CATEGORY_SEQ ,c.TITLE as category_title FROM POST p, MEMBER m, CATEGORY c WHERE p.MEMBER_SEQ = m.SEQ AND p.BOARD_SEQ = c.BOARD_SEQ AND p.CATEGORY_SEQ = #{seq} ORDER BY REF,STEP
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORY SET TITLE=#{title} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT c.SEQ, c.TITLE FROM CATEGORY c,BOARD b WHERE c.BOARD_SEQ = b.SEQ AND BOARD_SEQ=#{seq}
